title: Cheesy Tomato And Turkey Bake
directions: Toss together cooked pasta, turkey, tomatoes, cottage & cheddar cheeses, green onions, marjoram, salt and red pepper flakes in lightly buttered 9-by-13-inch baking dish.
Bake for 30 minutes at 350 or until casserole is bubbling and top is lightly browned.
ingredients: 35 oz can Italian peeled tomatoes; drained & chopped
1 lb Pasta, cooked; tubular macaroni (elbow or penne)
1 Tablespoon Butter; cut in tiny cubes
